summary: A fully craft-able, enchant-able, extra fast, dual wield-able Blade of Woe! NEW!! V1.1 Now Re-textured too!!
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/WoeLogo_zps893f5ca0.jpg[/IMG]

Thank you for downloading and trying SoulMaster\'s Blade of Woe

I realise there are a few mods based on The Blade of Woe, but I decided to do my own version and share it for those who may be interested.

I was never very impressed with the Vanilla version - stuck with a poor enchantment not craftable etc.

The original in game Blade of Woe is unaffected this is a new standalone version.

[color=#FFFF00]SoulMasters Blade of Woe features:
Fully craftable at any forge (Under Steel)
Can be upgraded via the grinding wheel
Can have any enchantment you want
Is dual wieldable 
Faster attack speed
NEW!! Re-textured for V1.1[/color]

[color=#00FF00]Installation:
Download and install with Nexus Mod Manager[/color]

Please leave any feedback or bug reports.

I hope you enjoy using SoulMasters Blade of Woe!

[color=#00FFFF]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

SoulMasterII

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]

[color=#FF0000]Version History:
V1.0 Initial upload
V1.1 Re-textured SoulMaster\'s Blade of Woe[/color]

[color=#FFFF00]Please, DO NOT upload any part of my mods anywhere else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII
